ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: Are you interested in building products that leverage machine learning and pattern recognition algorithms? Are you looking to apply your state-of-the-art knowledge to produce features like Scribble for watchOS or Searchable Handwriting for iOS? The Core Recognition team is looking for an exceptional engineer to help develop its next generation of machine learning and handwriting recognition solutions.

ul.li: Experience developing handwriting or gesture recognition systems
Understanding of deep learning algorithms and modern machine learning approaches
Strong software development and debugging skills

div.p: The Core Recognition team is looking for a candidate with exceptional experience developing modern handwriting solutions and we are seeking an engineer to contribute to the evolution and future of our handwriting products. Ideal candidates must have experience and low-level knowledge of handwriting recognition systems. Expertise in offline and online handwriting analysis, neural networks and other statistical pattern recognition systems as well as experience managing large datasets is a plus.
Ph.D. or MA in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a closely related field.
